DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect East-West collaborative medicine chronic cervical pain .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect East-West Collaborative Medicine Chronic Cervical Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Design : This randomize , control study . Participants : 45 participant chronic cervical pain recruit randomly assign three group . Intervention : Over three-week period , one group ( n=15 ) get western medicine treatment ( drug medication ) ; another group ( n=15 ) get oriental medicine treatment ( individualized needling 2-3 time week ) ; group ( n=15 ) get western medicine plus oriental medicine treatment 3 week
DOC.criteria: presence Chronic neck pain Cancer Spinal infection ankylose spondylosis myelopathy moderate hypertension serious mental disease skeletomuscular disease history operation acupuncture treatment spinal disease
